participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and food-loving, he enjoys exploring diverse cuisines and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: hey there i am 23 and i love food. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been traveling the world for a years.

participant_2.name: Zoe
participant_2.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, she enjoys adventurous activities and has a passion for plant-based cooking.
participant_2.background: i am a vegan and i love hummus. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i do like watching cooking shows. i am not a good swimmer at all.

content.text: Hey! Are you not using it? Because I am.
I like to cook. I like to cook.
What do you like when you don't cook?
I like to cook. I like to cook.
